text:
The best practices were what we paid Dr. Brown for. Not you picking email rules and ignoring the actual therapist part of the engagement noted
below.
Best practices are actually in the two books that Jennifer asked you to read. Should we agree that we will start following those now? I’m game.
Message 3490 of 4024
I have taken it up with Lisa, and she has sent emails to Natalie. Those have been ignored last week.
Now you know that they have been ignored, is it still your advice for me to go through legal channels?
Divorce and child custody is a $28 billion business. I’m asking to do something helpful for Max and Adrian not pay for college and vacations for
someone else.
You outsourced parenting to lawyers. I’m going to hold firm that they may be well intentioned but unqualified to be my kids decision makers.
Can we discuss seeing the kids this week. They have no plans. I was 100% in charge this time last year and am only more sober and more responsible.
Sent:07/08/2024 at 11:50 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 07/08/2024 at 12:03 PM)
Subject:Re: Kids This Week
Message 3491 of 4024
I am not free until after 5:30 today.
We responded in regards to more time.
Sent:07/08/2024 at 12:04 PM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 07/08/2024 at 12:08 PM)
Subject:Re: Kids This Week
Message 3492 of 4024
I am happy to chat after 5:30. Just let me know when.
If you have responded, you made my point. Our conversation and the mental health outcome of our kids is sitting somewhere in an email folder
between the three degrees of separation established in the $28 billion parenting model that’s been chosen. (that number is 5-years old btw)
This time last year I was floating down the lazy river and lining up for adventures in Leavenworth with both our kids, their friends, and Katherine’s
family. I was an amazing dad then and have only improved. There is no legal reason for me to be blocked right now so we should discuss how I can
parent our kids.
I will not be #erased.
Sent:07/08/2024 at 12:31 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 07/08/2024 at 01:49 PM)
Subject:Re: Kids This Week
